review: Setup was easy. The device did not like my wireless network at first, but performed to expectation after a reset. Bought it early for 50% off and am very happy with the device for that price point. I wish I had a chromecast to compare it to, but I do not. I use it almost exclusively for Netflix and Prime video streaming.
author: RF

review: As an Amazon Prime member I was fortunate to be able to order one of these for $19 via pre-order.  I am so glad I did, I am pleased with it.  It within 15 minutes I had it up and running as it is plug and go.  This is a great product if you are streaming Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime Instant or using pre-loaded apps (you can even stream video from media server using AllCast app).  Will definitely buy more!
